LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRAssaultRifle.label: FSR Assault rifle
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRAssaultRifle.description:
An assault rifle designed to be used by mech soldiers. Reinforced barrel and complex breech-mechanism allows to use FSR ammo.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRAssaultRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRAssaultRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRMachineGun.label: FSR Heavy repeater
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRMachineGun.description:
A heavy machine gun with helical magazine designed for use as automatroids weapon. Reinforced barrel and complex breech-mechanism allows to use FSR ammo.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRMachineGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRPistol.label: FSR Light carabine
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRPistol.description: A stub-barreled mech carabine. Reinforced barrel and complex breech-mechanism allows to use FSR ammo.
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMSRC_FSRPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: FSR Light carabine
